translation.en: [woman, in Portuguese] Are you hungry? Your father will be home shortly.
translation.it: Hai fame? Tuo padre tornerà tra poco.

translation.en: I'll change my clothes.
-Then keep me company in the kitchen. -[responds indistinctly]
translation.it: Mi cambio. Poi vieni in cucina con me? Va bene.

translation.en: -[in Portuguese] Good morning. -[man, in Portuguese] Water...
Water.
-Mom! -I'll be out in a minute.
Be quiet and don't move!
-Ma... -I told you to shut up.
[mother] Please don't hurt us.
-[man, in English] Search the house. -[mother] Take what you want and go.
translation.it: Controlla ogni stanza. Prendete ciò che volete.

translation.en: Run, Matias, run!
[man] Isabel!
[woman] Zeca!
Help me!
Please, God, help us.
[man, in Portuguese] Mrs. Santana, you're fully dilated. We have to deliver the baby.
We have to deliver the baby... Push! You're going to give birth now. Push!
translation.it: Dobbiamo farlo nascere. Spinga! Deve nascere ora. Spinga!

translation.en: Mama, it's okay.
-Good afternoon. -[man] Good afternoon, General.
Is my brother inside? Open the gate, please.
Yes, sir, but the commander asked not to be disturbed.
translation.it: Il comandante ha chiesto di non essere disturbato.

translation.en: You have ten seconds to open the gate before this gets ugly. Understand?
translation.it: Avete dieci secondi per aprire o finirà molto male.

translation.en: I'm sorry, General.
Take him out of here.
-[man, in English] Have you got them? -[man 2] I'm looking at them, boss.
[man] Nobody steals from me.
[man 2] Understand, boss.
Kill him.
[in English] You speak English?
Good.
You're next.
Unless you can think of something to make me and my friends there... happy.
translation.it: A meno che non trovi il modo di far felici me e i miei amici.

translation.en: You understand what I'm saying?
Whatever they want, whenever they want it.
translation.it: Tutto quello che vogliono, tutte le volte che vogliono.

translation.en: And then maybe we can forget you and you're boyfriend's stupidity.
translation.it: E forse scorderemo la stupidità tua e del tuo ragazzo.

translation.en: Go to work.
HAPPY BIRTHDAY, BROTHER!
[man, in Portuguese] Dias, where are you?
We have a location. We're ready to move in.
translation.it: Li abbiamo trovati. Siamo pronti a intervenire.

translation.en: You're needed here. Call me.
[in Portuguese] Matias, I see you and Dias as my sons
translation.it: Matias, considero te e Dias come figli miei,

translation.en: because I was very good friends with your father.
translation.it: tanto ero amico di vostro padre.

translation.en: But... as commander of the police...
it's my duty to act and say your brother's recent behavior is unacceptable.
translation.it: sono costretto a intervenire. La condotta di Dias è ormai inaccettabile.

translation.en: I'm disappointed. Has he lost his mind?
translation.it: Sono molto deluso. È forse impazzito?

translation.en: Dias' heavy drinking, not reporting in for days, relaxing at home,
translation.it: Beve come una spugna, sparisce per giorni, poltrisce a casa invece di presentarsi al lavoro.

translation.en: not getting his ass to work.
translation.it: poltrisce a casa invece di presentarsi al lavoro.

translation.en: All our attempts to help him and it seems our efforts have no results.
translation.it: Abbiamo tentato di tutto per aiutarlo, ma senza risultato.

translation.en: But... this can't carry on...
not on my watch.
[Matias] I understand, Commander, and I apologize on his behalf.
translation.it: Capisco perfettamente, Comandante, e mi scuso a nome di Dias.

translation.en: The anniversary of my parents' murder is the same day my brother was born.
translation.it: Mio fratello è nato lo stesso giorno in cui furono uccisi i miei genitori.

translation.en: Birthdays are never easy for him.
translation.it: I compleanni sono sempre difficili per lui.

translation.en: But there is no excuse.
I was going to give you one month's leave as requested.
translation.it: Volevo concederti un mese di ferie come mi avevi chiesto.

translation.en: I have given this a lot of thought.
translation.it: Ma ci ho riflettuto a lungo

translation.en: I'm assigning you as the DNIC Commander.
translation.it: e ho deciso di nominarti comandante del DNIC,

translation.en: So you can keep him an eye on him.
You will be my eyes and ears on this operation.
translation.it: Sarai i miei occhi e le mie orecchie in questa operazione.

translation.en: You and your brother will get this done.
translation.it: Tu e tuo fratello la porterete a termine con successo.

translation.en: Understood?
Get out.
Hey, Commander Dias Santana is here.
translation.it: È arrivato il comandante Dias Santana.

translation.en: About time. Less we have to deal with that nappy wearin' lieutenant the better.
translation.it: Era ora. Non dovremo più sopportare quel tenente che se la fa sotto!

translation.en: I don't think that guy's ever fired a shot in his life.
translation.it: Per me, non ha mai sparato in vita sua.

translation.en: The only shots he fires... are at his wife's ass.
translation.it: Spara le sue cartucce solo sul culo di sua moglie.

translation.en: Hey, have some respect.
What's up, boys? What are we talking about? Football again?
translation.it: Come va, ragazzi? Di che parlate? Di nuovo di calcio?

translation.en: Sergeant Marco.
Might want to pull that tongue back in your mouth, rookie. Might swallow a fly.
translation.it: Smetti di sbavare a bocca aperta o ingoierai qualche mosca.

translation.en: No, I was just... staring.
I know you all missed me, so save your niceties for someone who needs it.
translation.it: So che vi sono mancato. Quindi risparmiate i convenevoli. Spero che abbiate ancora in mente la missione, perché oggi si va in scena.

translation.en: I hope your minds are still fixed on our mission, because it's happening.
translation.it: Spero che abbiate ancora in mente la missione, perché oggi si va in scena.

translation.en: Sergeant Qeto, the details.
-Good morning, men. -[all] Good morning, Sergeant.
Okay, our mission today is this warehouse in Mutamba.
translation.it: Bene. Il vostro obiettivo di oggi è questo magazzino a Mutamba.

translation.en: We have information
translation.it: Abbiamo saputo che è la base

translation.en: that this complex houses one of the biggest drug operations
translation.it: Abbiamo saputo che è la base di una delle più grandi reti di spaccio di droga della città.

translation.en: in the city.
translation.it: di una delle più grandi reti di spaccio di droga della città.

translation.en: I'm going to pass this over to Agent Orlando,
translation.it: Passo ora la parola all'agente Orlando.

translation.en: who worked with Sinse Investigations.
translation.it: Ha svolto l'attività info-investigativa con il SINSE.

translation.en: [Orlando] Obi Chukwu... Nigerian. He's the ringleader's right hand.
translation.it: Obi Chukwu, nigeriano. Braccio destro del boss.

translation.en: And the big boss?
We don't know his name or who he is. We are calling him Mr. X for now.
translation.it: Non sappiamo il suo nome né chi sia. Lo chiamiamo "signor X".

translation.en: Maybe his mama never gave him one.
translation.it: Forse sua madre non gliel'ha neanche dato un nome.

translation.en: Okay, settle down.
General Matias will be leading the operation with Commander Dias.
translation.it: Il generale Matias dirigerà l'operazione insieme al comandante Dias.

translation.en: -You got that? -[men] Yes, sir!
Commander...
I'd like to be on this mission.
Alright, but don't screw up.
translation.it: Va bene. Ma non mandare tutto a puttane.

translation.en: [Dias, in English] What's your name, agent?
On the streets, Shefor, Dirty Man.
translation.it: In strada, mi chiamano Dirty Man.

translation.en: But it's Roland, my name's Roland.
translation.it: Ma il mio vero nome è Roland.

translation.en: Well, Shefor... As of now, you're off the street.
translation.it: Beh, Dirty Man, d'ora in poi non starai più per strada.

translation.en: You're mission's over, finito.
You can go back to the UK.
What's the lowdown inside?
There's thirteen men and eight women, a few of them top ranking.
translation.it: Tredici uomini e otto donne. Tre sono pesci grossi.

translation.en: They've got assault rifles, some battle rifles, AK-47s and Jerichos.
translation.it: Hanno fucili d'assalto, qualche fucile da battaglia, AK-47 e Jericho.

translation.en: The women are basically slaves. They never leave.
translation.it: Le donne sono praticamente schiave. Non escono mai.

translation.en: And X?
I don't know. It could be anyone.
I know they're moving a lot of cash today, so he's got to be here.
translation.it: Ma oggi sarà qui. Devono spostare molti contanti.

translation.en: Good job, agent.
Take a nice long vacation.
[Dias, in Portuguese] Listen up, Mr. X is most likely here.
translation.it: Molto probabilmente il signor X è qui.

translation.en: No description...
but... we have Mac 10s, AK47s.
translation.it: Ma abbiamo dei MAC-10 e degli AK-47.

translation.en: Bring the heavy fire power and let's be smooth about it.
translation.it: Portate l'artiglieria pesante e facciamo un lavoro pulito.

translation.en: -Understood? -[all] Yes, sir!
I want to thank you for what you did back at your house with the chief...
translation.it: Ti sono grato per ciò che hai fatto a casa tua

translation.en: and the motorcycle... but I can take it from here.
translation.it: con il capo. E anche per la moto.

translation.en: I don't need your brotherly concern or help.
translation.it: Ma da qui posso cavarmela da solo. Non ho bisogno che ti preoccupi per me o che cerchi di aiutarmi.

translation.en: Four years and nothing has changed.
translation.it: Quattro anni e nulla è cambiato.

translation.en: Commander, as your superior,
I suggest you get with the program if you want to stay a cop.
translation.it: ti suggerisco di rimetterti in riga, se vuoi restare in polizia.

translation.en: Okay, guys, let's lock and load.
translation.it: Bene, ragazzi. Armi cariche e pronti all'assalto.

translation.en: General, with your permission, we've got garbage out back that needs removing.
translation.it: Generale, c'è della spazzatura da eliminare sul retro.

translation.en: [Matias] Already on it.
Marco, De Costa. Greenlight, entrance.
translation.it: Marco, De Costa. Tocca a voi. Entrata principale.

translation.en: Sir, already got them in our cross hairs. Injured, or in a body bag?
translation.it: Li teniamo già sotto tiro. Li vuole all'ospedale o in un sacco per cadaveri?

translation.en: Gentleman, people are going to die here today, and it's not going to be one of us.
translation.it: Oggi qualcuno finirà cadavere di sicuro, ma non sarà nessuno di noi.

translation.en: Bag them.
Shit... Got one heading your way.
Reis, deal with that.
translation.it: Reis, pensaci tu senza far rumore.

translation.en: Okay, perimeter secure. Breach, breach, breach!
[in English] Fuck me, look at this place! Fuckin' mess.
translation.it: Ma guarda questo posto. È un casino. Ehi!

translation.en: Hey! It's a fuckin' mess!
translation.it: È un casino. Ehi! Questo posto è un casino!

translation.en: Everybody, radio in.
Blanco, all good.
[man] Clean room. Quiet.
[man 2] Beanie, roof secure.
Tito... Tito?
Tito... You better not be asleep, huh?
translation.it: Tito, meglio che tu non stia dormendo.

translation.en: Clear out the front, boss.
Ok, now listen. Stay alert.
We have a lot of drugs and money to move today. Stay alert!
translation.it: Oggi spostiamo droga e contanti. Occhi aperti.

translation.en: Copy that.
[in Portuguese] Hey, Ze Maria, don't get cocky about it.
You want to radio him something better? It worked, okay.
translation.it: Avevi idee migliori? Ha funzionato, no?

translation.en: I hope so. Let's move.
Deal with this.
[in English] Quiet! Not a word.
I'm going to take my hand off your mouth.
translation.it: Ora ti tolgo la mano dalla bocca.

translation.en: Please... don't scream.
You understand?
You'll never get off the shot.
Your call.
Everybody get down!
And shut the fuck up!
Cover me!
[man, in Portuguese] You'll live.
You've got friendlies down here!
General Matias, we have a runner heading out of the east wing,
translation.it: Generale, uno sta scappando dall'ala est

translation.en: and he's carrying a briefcase. Could be our boy.
translation.it: con una valigetta. Forse è lui.

translation.en: -[Matias] Have you got a shot? -No.
Have you got him?
[sniper] Negative.
[Matias] Throw it down.
[in English] I need your car. Everyone, get out! Everybody, out!
translation.it: Mi serve il pulmino. Tutti fuori! Fuori!

translation.en: Everyone, shut up or bang bang, understand?
Boss, we got nailed. DNIC and military at Mutamba.
translation.it: Capo, c'è stato un blitz. DNIC e militari. A Mutamba.

translation.en: What about my fucking drugs and my fucking money?
translation.it: La mia cazzo di droga e i miei cazzo di soldi?

translation.en: It's gone, all of it. The drugs and money.
Get to the port near the Marginal. I'll organize your pick up.
translation.it: Vai al porto della Marginal. Ti mando a prendere.

translation.en: [in Portuguese] Go ahead. Run, asshole.
[in English] We are flying out today. Get the bag ready.
translation.it: Lasciamo il Paese. Oggi. Preparate la borsa.

translation.en: [in Portuguese] You've got fifteen minutes.
Sweet talk him. Lie to him. I don't care.
Just get the name of his boss.
translation.it: Voglio il nome del suo capo.

translation.en: You want to be a field agent? Here's your shot.
translation.it: Vuoi lavorare sul campo? È la tua occasione.

translation.en: -What the hell is this? -Change of tactics.
If I go in, I'm just going to kick his ass, so let the kid have a crack at it.
translation.it: Se entro io, gli spacco il muso. Lasciamo provare il ragazzo.

translation.en: Perp's in there.
I hope you know what you're doing.
translation.it: Spero che tu sappia quello che fai.

translation.en: [in English] Good afternoon.
I'm agent Orlando. I'll be asking some answers.
translation.it: Sono l'agente Orlando. Le faccio le risposte...

translation.en: No, I'm asking questions. You're giving answers.
translation.it: No. Io faccio le domande e lei risponde.

translation.en: Just for the record, I'm showing the prisoner pictures of wanted criminals.
translation.it: Per il rapporto: mostro al prigioniero le foto di alcuni ricercati.

translation.en: What can you tell me about this one?
translation.it: Che mi sa dire di loro?

translation.en: Are you crazy?
[in Portuguese] You're lucky I don't beat your ass.
translation.it: È fortunato che non le rompo la faccia.

translation.en: [in English] How many times... have you guys tried to kill Commander Dias...
translation.it: Quante volte avete provato a uccidere il comandante Dias?

translation.en: and failed? We are the police.
translation.it: E avete fallito. Siamo la polizia.

translation.en: You know... if the boss had wanted to kill the Santanas,
translation.it: Se il mio capo avesse voluto ammazzare i Santana...

translation.en: he would have done it when he killed your mother and your father.
translation.it: l'avrebbe fatto quando ha ucciso i vostri genitori.

translation.en: Or any time since.
You see...
the boss is still upset with the General for putting that scar on his face.
translation.it: è ancora arrabbiato perché il generale gli ha sfregiato il viso.

translation.en: You're still alive because he wants you to be.
translation.it: Siete vivi solo perché lo vuole lui.

translation.en: [in Portuguese] He should have killed me in my mother's womb.
translation.it: Avrebbe dovuto uccidermi nel ventre di mia madre.

translation.en: [in English] Where is your boss?
You will put in the report
that the prisoner tried to reach for your weapon.
translation.it: che il prigioniero voleva prenderti la pistola.

translation.en: [in Portuguese] On the count of ten.
Shoot this asshole.
translation.it: e poi spara a questo stronzo.

translation.en: [In English] I swear by my mother's and my father's grave that I will kill you now.
translation.it: O giuro sulla tomba dei miei genitori che ti ammazzo subito.

translation.en: [in Portuguese] Ten... nine... eight... seven... six...
-[in English] Tell them now, Mr. Chukwu. -...five... four... three... Talk...
[in English] Okay, okay...
He's probably in South Africa by now.
That is where he does most of his operations,
he has people everywhere.
In the police, DNIC, the military. I'm probably a dead man now.
translation.it: Nella polizia, nel DNIC, tra i militari. Sono un uomo morto.

translation.en: What? What?
You think you got me?
No, you never got me. I got you.
translation.it: No. Non mi fregate. Io frego voi.

translation.en: His name is Makimba Ferreira.
translation.it: Il suo nome è Makimba Ferreira.

translation.en: And he sent me here with a message for you.
translation.it: E mi ha mandato qui con un messaggio.

translation.en: He's coming... and you won't even know it.
translation.it: Verrà da voi... e neanche ve ne accorgerete.

translation.en: [in Portuguese] We'll get him.
I promise.
-[Dias] Yeah? -How you doing?
I'm alright.
We're all getting together, remember?
Not really interested in a noisy club.
translation.it: Non mi attira un locale chiassoso.

translation.en: We have a meeting with the NP Commander tomorrow.
translation.it: Domani c'è la riunione con il capo della polizia.

translation.en: We'll get Ferreira.
You should come tonight. It'll be good.
translation.it: Vieni a divertirti un po' con noi stasera. Ti farebbe bene.

translation.en: Dias...
I don't know what happened between us, but maybe it's happening for a reason.
translation.it: non so cosa sia successo tra noi, ma forse c'è un motivo.

translation.en: Okay, if you don't come for me, do it for your men.
translation.it: Va bene. Se non vuoi venire per me, fallo per i tuoi uomini.

translation.en: Anything else?
Glad you made it. Happy birthday.
Happy birthday!
Cheers!
[all] To a happy birthday!
[Matias] Turn down the music!
Good evening, ladies and gentlemen.
Today is my brother's birthday. Well, not today, a few days ago.
translation.it: Oggi è il compleanno di mio fratello. Beh, in realtà, è stato qualche giorno fa.

translation.en: So today I want to wish him a happy birthday with a special song by...
translation.it: Oggi è il compleanno di mio fratello. Beh, in realtà, è stato qualche giorno fa. Comunque oggi voglio fargli gli auguri con un brano speciale

translation.en: Marco and Ze Maria.
translation.it: composto da Marco e Ze Maria.

translation.en: -Happy birthday, brother. -Yeah, thanks.
Now enjoy your ass and let me get this place jumping!
Excuse me... Want to dance?
[in English] Not tonight.
[in Portuguese] General Matias, your appointment has arrived.
Appointment? Damn, I need to get to DNIC this morning. Remind me?
translation.it: Quali rappresentanti? Stamattina devo andare al DNIC. Mi rammenta?

translation.en: Zentex from South Africa. The expiring arms contracts.
translation.it: La Zentex, dal Sudafrica. La fornitura di armi.

translation.en: Right, send them in.
[in English] General Santana.
-[in Portuguese] Good morning. -Morning.
You enjoy your birthday?
I don't really do birthdays, but yes, it was a good gesture.
translation.it: Non mi piace festeggiarlo. Ma è stato un bel gesto.

translation.en: So, what do you do?
I'm a cleaner. I clean the rubbish from the street.
You're getting ready to leave. Okay, will I see you again?
translation.it: Sei già pronto ad andartene. Va bene. Ci rivediamo?

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I shouldn't have done this.
I have to go.
[in English] Hello, Mum.
-How are you? -Good.
You look well.
-Who's that? -[child] That's you.
[man] With that big head?
-Oh, I don't know about that. -[child] It's not really big.
translation.it: Non sono così. Non è una testona.

translation.en: I'm gonna have to take this... Excuse me.
You back in Cape Town?
Good. Let's meet.
[in Portuguese] What bullshit!
Do they actually want to clean up the crime
or do they just want to talk about it?
Because that sounded like a lot of talk and no action.
translation.it: Tante belle parole, ma niente fatti.

translation.en: How are we going to get Ferreira in South Africa if we can't go there?
translation.it: Come becchiamo Ferreira senza andare in Sudafrica?

translation.en: I don't know what just happened. I'll find out.
translation.it: Non so cosa sia successo. Lo scoprirò.

translation.en: This was supposed to be a strategy meeting to bring Ferreira back.
translation.it: Doveva essere una riunione strategica per riportare qui Ferreira.

translation.en: Then someone got to them.
And what does that tell you about them, the ones you want to be like?
translation.it: E questo cosa ti dice su di loro? Su quegli uomini che tanto ammiri e rispetti?

translation.en: I'm done. From now on, I'll do things my own way if I have to.
translation.it: Io ho chiuso. D'ora in poi, farò le cose a modo mio, se devo.

translation.en: [in English] Walk with me.
I find walking keeps the energy moving.
It's less awkward.
And I assume this is an awkward moment,
you having lost two million dollars of my money?
translation.it: aver perso due milioni dei miei dollari.

translation.en: It's not like we are in the furniture business.
We have risks.
Which is your area of expertise, what you're paid to mitigate.
translation.it: Ma è questo il tuo campo. Vieni pagato proprio per ridurre i rischi.

translation.en: Can I presume the police were involved in the loss of my two million?
translation.it: Nella perdita dei miei due milioni è implicata la polizia, presumo.

translation.en: I'll deal with it. A cop. We go back many years.
translation.it: Uno sbirro. Ci penso io. C'è una vecchia faida tra noi.

translation.en: -He may be coming here. -No, he won't.
translation.it: - Potrebbe venire qui... - No, non verrà.

translation.en: And don't deal with it. I can live with the two million.
translation.it: E tu non farai niente. Sopravvivrò senza due milioni.

translation.en: But dealing with an officer of the law...
translation.it: Ma eliminare un agente di polizia potrebbe causare perdite ben maggiori,

translation.en: It could cause greater losses I won't be so willing to walk away from.
translation.it: Ma eliminare un agente di polizia potrebbe causare perdite ben maggiori, che non sarei disposto a tollerare.

translation.en: It's central Africa. It's practically synonymous with corruption.
translation.it: Africa centrale è praticamente sinonimo di corruzione.

translation.en: Now find a way...
translation.it: Tu ora devi fare in modo

translation.en: and ensure that my operations aren't put in jeopardy in the future.
translation.it: di proteggere i miei commerci. Nulla deve più metterli a rischio.

translation.en: Does that make sense?
-Yes? -Yes.
Good.
It's a beautiful day.
Enjoy it.
I'm sorry I'm late.
No, the dedicated general keeping people safe.
translation.it: Il generale sempre impegnato a proteggerci.

translation.en: No need to apologize. Thank you.
[in Portuguese] Sorry about the other night.
Sorry for what?
Unless you're here to arrest me, or need me professionally, Commander...
translation.it: Se non sei qui per arrestarmi o per lavoro,

translation.en: I'm going for a swim.
[in English] I've enjoyed this more than I have in a long time.
translation.it: Non mi divertivo così da tanto.

translation.en: Me too.
[in Portuguese] You know I'm afraid of the ocean, ever since I was a boy.
translation.it: Sai, io ho il terrore del mare. Sin da quando ero piccolo.

translation.en: And here you are in the middle of the ocean. Should I be impressed?
translation.it: Eppure eccoti qui, nell'acqua. Dovrei essere colpita?

translation.en: Are you?
I'm hanging out with some of the boys in The Borough tonight.
translation.it: Stasera esco con alcuni ragazzi della squadra.

translation.en: That's our spot. You should come down and join us.
translation.it: Ci ritroviamo al nostro solito posto. Perché non ti unisci a noi?

translation.en: -Pretty please, sir? -Maybe.
Maybe?
Okay.
[in English] Come. I want to show you something.
My father lived here with my grandparents before they moved to the city.
translation.it: Mio padre viveva qui con i miei nonni, prima che si trasferissero in città.

translation.en: I was six, but I still remember visiting during the war.
translation.it: A sei anni, mi portarono qui in visita. C'era la guerra.

translation.en: My father said... I need to protect the family when he was gone.
translation.it: Mio padre mi disse che dovevo proteggere la famiglia, se lui fosse morto.

translation.en: After they were killed...
I was taken to live with a family in Cunene.
translation.it: e io finii a vivere con una famiglia nel Cunene.

translation.en: Dias was not so fortunate.
We've never been close.
[in Portuguese] Fuck it. Why not?
Evening, gents.
Relax.
Cold beer, please.
Good to see you're out. Any word on Ferreira?
translation.it: Sei uscito. Bene. Novità su Ferreira?

translation.en: I know where he lives. He's not exactly keeping a low profile.
translation.it: So dove vive. Non sta tenendo un profilo propriamente basso.

translation.en: I also found out about the tragedy he brought to your family.
translation.it: So anche della tragedia che vi ha causato.

translation.en: No need to get into that.
translation.it: Non serve che indaghi su quello.

translation.en: -Keep me informed. -I will.
-Have fun tonight, okay? That's an order. -Okay.
translation.it: Divertiti, stasera. È un ordine. D'accordo.

translation.en: [in English] That is my father and my mother. I was six then.
translation.it: Quelli sono i miei genitori. Avevo sei anni, lì.

translation.en: Teach me how to kizomba. I've always wanted to learn.
translation.it: La kizomba. Ho sempre voluto impararla.

translation.en: [in Portuguese] Is this how you live a little?
translation.it: È così che ti godi la vita?

translation.en: Sitting alone?
-I'm not good with people. -At least that was honest.
translation.it: Non sono bravo con la gente. Almeno sei sincero.

translation.en: If you go after Ferreira in South Africa, I'd like to be in on it.
translation.it: se intendi inseguire Ferreira in Sudafrica, vorrei aiutarti.

translation.en: Orlando's not the only one who knows how to get information.
translation.it: Orlando non è l'unico che sa ottenere informazioni.

translation.en: I'm sorry about your mother and father.
translation.it: Mi dispiace per tua madre e tuo padre.

translation.en: It's not hard to figure out you're going after him.
translation.it: Vuoi dare la caccia a Ferreira, è ovvio.

translation.en: I could be an asset.
A man and woman traveling together as a couple attracts less attention.
translation.it: Due che viaggiano insieme come una coppia attirano meno l'attenzione.

translation.en: Think about it.
[in English] Kizomba is personal.
You must surrender... give in...
and let the man... guide you.
translation.it: E lasciare che l'uomo... ti guidi.

translation.en: [in Portuguese] I'll see you all Monday.
If you find anything else, let me know.
Alright, take care.
[man, in English] Open it!
-You know how to use a gun? -I've never tried.
translation.it: - Sai usare una pistola? - Mai provato.

translation.en: You sell weapons and you don't know how to use one?
translation.it: Vendi armi e non sai usarle?

translation.en: If anyone comes through this door, you just point and pull the trigger.
translation.it: Se entra qualcuno dalla porta, prendi la mira e spara.

translation.en: -[woman] And if it's you? -[Matias] You don't shoot.
translation.it: - Se sei tu? - Allora non sparare.

translation.en: Where is he?
-[beeping] -Shit!
Lesson one: Take the kill when you can!
[in Portuguese] Second lesson: Shut up and shoot.
translation.it: Seconda lezione: chiudi il becco e spara.

translation.en: -Are you alone? -Give me a gun.
-[in English] Excuse me one moment. -Of course.
-[in Portuguese] What are you doing here? -We need to talk, minister.
translation.it: - Che ci fate qui? - Dobbiamo parlare, Ministro.

translation.en: Right now.
He's the main guy, the head of it all.
translation.it: Ecco l'uomo al vertice, il capo di tutto.

translation.en: Cut off the head and we stop the biggest drug operation
translation.it: Tagliamo via la testa e fermeremo la rete di narcotrafficanti più grande in Angola e Africa centrale.

translation.en: in Angola and Central Africa.
translation.it: e fermeremo la rete di narcotrafficanti più grande in Angola e Africa centrale.

translation.en: And the murders that go with it.
translation.it: Insieme a tutti gli omicidi che causa.

translation.en: He killed three of my men tonight. Men with families.
translation.it: Stanotte hanno ucciso tre dei miei. Padri di famiglia.

translation.en: And three of mine. They spoke English. They're not even from here.
translation.it: E tre dei miei. Parlavano inglese. Quindi non sono neanche di qui.

translation.en: We know where he is in South Africa.
Send the two of us and a small group of agents under cover.
translation.it: Ci mandi lì sotto copertura, noi e pochi altri.

translation.en: Ask the Deputy Minister and Commissioner Martins to come in.
translation.it: Chiami il viceministro e il capo della polizia Martins.

translation.en: As much as I would like to think so, I'm not the only voice here.
translation.it: È una decisione che non dipende solo da me.

translation.en: What you're asking
translation.it: E posso acconsentire solo se Ferreira sarà arrestato

translation.en: can only be done if he can be captured or eliminated discreetly.
translation.it: E posso acconsentire solo se Ferreira sarà arrestato o eliminato in modo discreto.

translation.en: I can't allow the two of you to cause problems between South Africa and Angola.
translation.it: Non posso permettervi di causare un incidente diplomatico tra Angola e Sudafrica.

translation.en: You are my best men...
but the country comes first.
translation.it: ma la reputazione del nostro Paese viene prima.

translation.en: Gentlemen...
We have a sensitive issue, which I know I can rely upon you to assist with.
translation.it: Signori, abbiamo un problema delicato e so di poter contare sul vostro aiuto.

translation.en: We need diplomatic visas to South Africa.
translation.it: Servono dei visti diplomatici per il Sudafrica.

translation.en: And I assume untraceable weapons?
translation.it: E presumo... delle armi non registrate?

translation.en: Sir, do you know what you're asking?
translation.it: Eccellenza, sa cosa ci sta chiedendo?

translation.en: Yes, I do. I'm doing it for the defense of this country.
translation.it: Sì, lo so. Ma è nell'interesse del Paese.

translation.en: Consider it done. Shouldn't be a problem.
I don't need to tell you not to speak to anyone.
translation.it: Non serve che vi dica di non rivelare niente a nessuno.

translation.en: Unfortunately, confidential information in the NP
translation.it: Purtroppo, le informazioni confidenziali nella polizia

translation.en: seems to get bought and sold like milk.
translation.it: Purtroppo, le informazioni confidenziali nella polizia vengono vendute come il pane.

translation.en: They definitely have someone on the inside.
We can't trust anyone.
I assume my actions have met with your satisfaction?
translation.it: Confido di aver soddisfatto le vostre aspettative.

translation.en: [both] Yes, sir.
[in English] He's checking you for a wire.
I'm curious...
Was it something in my words...
my tone... my demeanor...
translation.it: nel mio tono, nel mio atteggiamento

translation.en: that perhaps suggested to you that I speak simply to hear the sound of my own voice?
translation.it: deve averti suggerito che io parlo solo per ascoltare il suono della mia voce.

translation.en: I know people cursed with that malady.
translation.it: Conosco persone afflitte da questa malattia.

translation.en: They open their mouths but what comes out... are just empty words.
translation.it: Aprono la bocca ed escono solo parole vuote,

translation.en: Devoid of thought or meaning.
translation.it: prive di senso e di significato.

translation.en: I don't expect an answer as...
I had assumed I had made it perfectly clear regarding the policemen
translation.it: perché mi sembrava di essere stato molto chiaro e di averti chiesto esplicitamente di non toccare quel poliziotto.

translation.en: that I specifically asked you not to touch.
translation.it: e di averti chiesto esplicitamente di non toccare quel poliziotto.

translation.en: I do business in several countries
translation.it: Conduco i miei affari in vari Paesi,

translation.en: and employ many people who perform the same responsibilities as yours.
translation.it: avvalendomi dell'aiuto di molte persone che offrono i tuoi stessi servizi.

translation.en: If you feel the need again
translation.it: Se ti capitasse di nuovo di sentire la necessità

translation.en: to put me, my business and my family at risk,
translation.it: di mettere a rischio me, i miei affari e la mia famiglia...

translation.en: I will not hesitate to make an example of you to others in my employ.
translation.it: non esiterò a trasformarti in un esempio per chiunque lavori per me,

translation.en: In the most horrendous way possible.
translation.it: punendoti nella maniera più orrenda possibile.

translation.en: Does that make sense?
Does it?
[in Portuguese] Yeah, walk away, asshole.
Go stick your fucking head in a hole and maybe it'll all go away.
translation.it: Infila la testa sotto la sabbia e sparirà tutto.

translation.en: God damn it!
Are you insane? He's from the president's office.
translation.it: Sei matto? Quello fa parte del Consiglio dei Ministri.

translation.en: So what?
Let him fire me.
Hell, I'll hand in my resignation if this is the best we can do.
translation.it: Rassegnerò io stesso le dimissioni, se è tutto qui quello che possiamo fare.

translation.en: I'm sorry, General.
[in English] Thandi, what are you doing here?
I was there too last night and it wasn't just the two of you he tried to kill.
translation.it: C'ero anch'io ieri sera. Non hanno cercato di uccidere solo voi.

translation.en: [in Portuguese] You owe her. Tell her we don't actually arrest criminals in Africa.
translation.it: Glielo devi. Dille la verità: in Africa non arrestiamo i criminali.

translation.en: -I have contacts in South Africa. -No.
translation.it: - Ho dei contatti in Sudafrica. - No.

translation.en: I live there.
So how difficult do you think it will be for him
translation.it: Credi che sarà difficile per lui

translation.en: to figure out who I am and where I live?
translation.it: scoprire chi sono e dove vivo? Posso aiutarvi a prenderlo.

translation.en: -I can help you get him. -Can you get weapons?
translation.it: scoprire chi sono e dove vivo? Posso aiutarvi a prenderlo. - Procurandoci delle armi? - Non solo.

translation.en: -And more. -You're both crazy!
You want to spend the rest of your life in prison?
translation.it: Volete beccarvi il carcere a vita?

translation.en: [in Portuguese] Do you and Thandi want to spend your life looking over your shoulders?
translation.it: Tu e Thandi volete passare la vita a guardarvi le spalle?

translation.en: Because he's not going to stop until we're all dead. You know that, Matias.
translation.it: Perché lui non si fermerà finché non saremo tutti morti, lo sai.

translation.en: Wake up, Matias.
You're living in a fucking fairytale if you think the law is going to protect us.
translation.it: Cazzo, vivi nel mondo delle favole se pensi che la legge ci proteggerà.

translation.en: [in English] Dias fucking Santana, boof!
translation.it: Quel pezzo di merda di Dias Santana...

translation.en: And his brother, boof!
And maybe a Scot next!
Get me a light.
I don't smoke.
You don't smoke.
Who fucking asked you if you smoke!
translation.it: Chi cazzo ti ha chiesto se fumi?

translation.en: My guys can't even kill two simple Angolan cops
translation.it: I miei uomini non sono neanche capaci di ammazzare due miseri sbirri angolani

translation.en: from Cunene, Endivja.
Where the great king, Mandume...
laid with his balls! In the bush!
Turn the fucking music off!
[man] This is the other witch, boss.
This is the witch? Ha!
Are you guys crazy?
Are you just playing with me?
This... is the witch that was chased away from Angola?
translation.it: Sarebbe questa la strega cacciata via dall'Angola?

translation.en: She doesn't look like a witch.
She doesn't even smell like a witch.
You're good...
Very good.
I want Dias Santana dead!
[witch] Dias Santana has a very strong spirit.
translation.it: Dias Santana ha uno spirito molto forte.

translation.en: You must put this necklace on him.
And then you need to cut off his head and eat his heart.
translation.it: Poi tagliagli la testa e mangiagli il cuore.

translation.en: I will bring him the demon of the deep forest
translation.it: Gli manderò il demone della foresta profonda,

translation.en: and the evil Brusharia, the dark spirit of Kabinda.
translation.it: il malvagio bruxaria spirito oscuro di Cabinda.

translation.en: With this, he won't be able to stop it, or you.
translation.it: Con la collana, non potrà fermare né lo spirito né te.

translation.en: There's just one thing...
What?
I want my money first.
Okay, you will get your money.
And I get Santana!
Hello. Thank you for taking my call.
-That matter we discussed? -[man] Yes?
translation.it: - Sai la questione di cui discutevamo? - Sì.

translation.en: Our mutual friend has decided on an early retirement.
translation.it: Quel nostro comune amico andrà in pensione anticipata.

translation.en: I agree.
Life is about choices. Thank you for your understanding.
translation.it: La vita è fatta di scelte. Ti ringrazio per la comprensione.

translation.en: [in Portuguese] Evening, gentlemen. I know I'm the last person you wanted to see.
translation.it: Buonasera, signori. Non vorreste vedermi qui, lo so.

translation.en: I know you don't have much time.
translation.it: E so anche che avete poco tempo.

translation.en: I'm not here to stop you.
The man you're after is hosting a party tomorrow night.
translation.it: L'uomo a cui date la caccia darà una festa domani sera.

translation.en: Apparently intended to celebrate...
your demise.
I hear you've been put on the invitation list.
translation.it: E siete sulla lista degli invitati.

translation.en: The Angolan government will denounce any non-sanctioned actions.
translation.it: Il governo angolano condannerà qualsiasi iniziativa non autorizzata.

translation.en: You're on your own.
-So we get this guy, right? -[abrupt screeching sound]
[Matias] Yeah, we get him. And we get our lives back.
translation.it: Sì, lo prenderemo. Così riavremo le nostre vite.

translation.en: You alright? What's the matter?
I'll be fine.
[in English] I have just had the best news I've heard all week!
translation.it: Ho appena ricevuto la notizia più bella della settimana.

translation.en: Some of my old acquaintances from Angola are coming to my party tomorrow night.
translation.it: Due miei vecchi amici angolani verranno alla mia festa di domani sera.

translation.en: I feel like celebrating.
Who should I celebrate with?
You, you
and... you.
Don't worry, they are with me.
Any more surprises?
-Thank you. -Thank you for what?
Letting me help. And for coming here.
translation.it: Di farti aiutare. E di essere venuto qui.

translation.en: I should have my head examined.
At least with me I know you are safe.
translation.it: Almeno so che sei al sicuro, con me.

translation.en: [Orlando] Eh, you look like Elvis!
-Thank you. -[Dias] You're late.
Yeah, uh, traffic.
-Sorry. -[Dias] Right.
Something else?
Yeah. No. Uh...
-[weapon clicks] -[woman] R5 assault rifles. 5.56 caliber.
Standard-issue police assault rifle.
Very reliable, based on the Israeli Galil.
Fourth gen Glock 17.
Not my favorite. Nine-mil Para, eighteen round mag.
-Pass me the sniper, Thandi. -Here.
Now, if you're looking for something to cover some distance,
translation.it: Se vi serve qualcosa da lunga distanza,

translation.en: we have this custom Enfield sniper.
Re-chambered to a 308.
Built-in silencer, high-powered scope... extremely compact.
translation.it: Silenziatore integrato, mirino telescopico, estremamente compatto.

translation.en: With all of this, can't say I wish I was going with you.
translation.it: Nonostante questo, sono lieta di non venire con voi.

translation.en: [Thandi] Thank you, Amanda.
[in Portuguese] Good luck.
We take Ferreira dead or alive. Any objections?
translation.it: Prendiamo Ferreira vivo o morto. Obiezioni?

translation.en: Alive if possible.
How likely is that with an army of gangsters around him?
translation.it: Come facciamo a prenderlo vivo se ha sempre un esercito con sé?

translation.en: If capturing him is on the agenda, then yes...
translation.it: Il piano era di prenderlo vivo.

translation.en: we'll kill him if we have to, but we're not here as assassins.
translation.it: Lo uccidiamo solo se necessario. Non siamo assassini.

translation.en: Are you okay?
Yeah, just... just tired, I guess.
I'm going to get some air.
I'll keep an eye on him.
Something is not right here.
It started back in Angola.
Okay, let's do this!
[in English] What's happened?
[in Portuguese] He started shouting, then passed out.
translation.it: Si è messo a gridare ed è svenuto.

translation.en: [Matias] That's it. We need to abort.
[in English] We need to get him a doctor.
No, no doctor can help me.
[in Portuguese] It's black magic.
Dias, what are you talking about?
[in English] I heard Ferreira uses witches to take down his enemies.
translation.it: Ferreira usa le streghe contro i suoi nemici, dicono.

translation.en: [in Portuguese] Black magic...
[in English] It's over.
I'm in command here. You are not fit to carry on.
translation.it: Prendo io il comando. Tu non stai bene.

translation.en: [in Portuguese] You can't tell me what to do.
You lost that right a long time ago.
translation.it: Hai perso questo diritto tanto tempo fa.

translation.en: I knew this would happen. You'd blame me.
translation.it: Sapevo che avresti dato la colpa a me.

translation.en: I was six years old, goddamn it!
translation.it: Avevo sei anni, per la miseria!

translation.en: I blame you for a lot of things...
your rich family in Cunene, while I went from one shitty orphanage to the next.
translation.it: Sei cresciuto tra gli agi a Cunene, mentre io in orfanotrofi di merda.

translation.en: Even when you came back to Luanda, where were you?
translation.it: E, tornato a Luanda, mi hai aiutato?

translation.en: I lived on the streets and had to fight to survive.
translation.it: Vivevo per strada. Ho dovuto lottare per sopravvivere.

translation.en: Yeah, I got into trouble with the people I ran with,
translation.it: Avevo amici con cui sono finito nei guai,

translation.en: but they were more family to me than you ever were.
translation.it: ma con loro sentivo di avere una famiglia. Con te no!

translation.en: I kept coming back for you, but you were always so difficult.
translation.it: Ma se continuavo a tornare da te! Solo che tu rendevi tutto così difficile.

translation.en: And that family took care of me like I was their own.
translation.it: E quella famiglia mi ha tirato su come se fossi figlio loro.

translation.en: You never wanted to listen, you still don't listen.
translation.it: Tu non vuoi mai dare retta a nessuno.

translation.en: You're stuck in the past where you've always been.
translation.it: Non riesci a lasciarti il passato alle spalle.

translation.en: You might as well have been buried with your parents.
translation.it: Potevi farti seppellire con i nostri genitori.

translation.en: At least you'd feel right at home. You hear, you idiot?
translation.it: Così ti saresti sentito a casa. No, brutto idiota?

translation.en: -You arrogant son of a bitch! -Hey!
[in English] Sorry, guys! We ain't got time for this shit.
translation.it: Scusate. Non c'è tempo per questo.

translation.en: [in Portuguese] Landlord's not going to like that.
translation.it: Il padrone di casa non sarà contento.

translation.en: [in English] Does it rain in Cape Town?
[in Portuguese] I didn't know you felt like that, brother.
translation.it: Non pensavo che ti sentissi così.

translation.en: It doesn't matter.
-I'm sorry. -Yeah, me too.
[in English] Are we going to do this?
[in Portuguese] Let's split up. Thandi.
Orlando, where are you?
I'm out back, on my way.
Orlando, we need to hurry this up. Ferreira may be arriving any moment now.
translation.it: Orlando, sbrigati. Ferreira arriverà a momenti.

translation.en: [Orlando] I'm coming...
Nearly there.
[Dias] Matias, we're coming out. Orlando has your weapon.
translation.it: Matias, ci muoviamo. Orlando ha la tua pistola.

translation.en: -[in English] Wait here. -Okay.
[Matias] I'll cover the entrance. You get to the main floor.
translation.it: Io copro l'entrata. Tu vai sulla pista da ballo.

translation.en: Thandi, it's time for you to go.
translation.it: Thandi, ora è meglio se vai.

translation.en: Thandi, look at the guard.
What are you two doing here?
We were enjoying a little privacy.
translation.it: Ci godiamo un po' di privacy.

translation.en: Lift up your arms.
-I can explain. -You better.
Hello, everybody!
Welcome to my party!
Look! All I want is for you guys to have some real good fun!
translation.it: Tutto ciò che voglio è che vi divertiate da matti!

translation.en: But if things start getting interesting,
translation.it: Ma, se le cose si fanno interessanti,

translation.en: please, come get me!
Mr. DJ, hit it!
-[in Portuguese] I have eyes on Ferreira. -[Matias] Do you have a clear shot at him?
translation.it: Vedo Ferreira. Visuale di tiro libera?

translation.en: There's too many people.
[Dias] If he comes this way, he's mine.
translation.it: Se viene verso di me, è mio.

translation.en: Orlando, blend in.
Oh, yes, sir.
[in English] Breach! Breach! There's been a breach.
Woman in a black dress, man in a white jacket!
translation.it: Donna in abito nero. Uomo con giacca bianca.

translation.en: [in Portuguese] We've been found out. Time for plan B. Things just got crazy out here.
translation.it: Siamo stati scoperti. Passare al piano B. Le cose si mettono male, qui.

translation.en: [Matias] Orlando, get us a ride out of here.
translation.it: Orlando, trovaci un'auto per la fuga.

translation.en: [man, in English] Hold it there. What is the problem?
Yeah, we've got a suspicious male...
-[Orlando, in Portuguese] I've got wheels. -Hold tight.
We have to get out of here.
translation.it: Dobbiamo uscire di qui. Vai da Orlando.

translation.en: Get to Orlando. Set up to give us cover, we're going to need it.
translation.it: Dobbiamo uscire di qui. Vai da Orlando. Dovrete darci fuoco di copertura.

translation.en: Watch your back.
-[in English] Are they here? -Yeah, and we have to take them out now.
translation.it: - Sono qui? - Sì. E vanno eliminati subito. Questo suo giochetto

translation.en: This game you're playing... They've taken down three of our guys.
translation.it: E vanno eliminati subito. Questo suo giochetto ci è già costato tre dei nostri.

translation.en: Four.
They don't leave here.
This party is a celebration for our good Commander's untimely demise.
translation.it: Siamo qui per festeggiare la prematura scomparsa del comandante.

translation.en: So it shall be.
So it shall be!
Where's Celia?
I sent her to the car. She should have passed you.
[Matias] We have to abort, and she didn't pass here.
translation.it: Dobbiamo ritirarci. E non ho visto Celia.

translation.en: [Dias] I can't leave her here. You go. I'll finish this myself. I'll find her...
translation.it: Non posso lasciarla qui. Tu vai. Finisco da solo. Trovo lei e becco Ferreira.

translation.en: and get Ferreira.
Orlando, any word on Celia?
Dias.
Matias, you go, I'll handle this.
translation.it: Matias, tu vattene. Ci penso io.

translation.en: [in English] Let her go.
I'm Dias Santana. The one your boss wants.
translation.it: Sono Dias Santana. - Il vostro capo vuole me. - Giù l'arma.

translation.en: Drop your weapon.
translation.it: - Il vostro capo vuole me. - Giù l'arma.

translation.en: Really?
[in Portuguese] You should have gone.
[in English] Put down your gun.
Or they're both dead in three seconds.
Okay, okay.
Drop your weapons. Turn around and put your hands on your heads.
translation.it: Gettate le armi, voltatevi e mettete le mani sopra la testa.

translation.en: Orlando, get out of here. Get to Thandi and go.
translation.it: Orlando, recupera Thandi e filate via di qui.

translation.en: Where are we?
I'll tell you... when I find out.
translation.it: Quando lo scopro, te lo dico.

translation.en: Hold on, brother. Hold on.
Where's Celia?
I don't know. We have to find a way out of here.
translation.it: Non lo so. Dobbiamo scappare di qui.

translation.en: Gentlemen...
So you actually thought you could just prance in here and, what... arrest me?
translation.it: Pensavate davvero di presentarvi qui e arrestarmi?

translation.en: Very heroic.
Now both of you are going to die like dogs.
That's no way for heroes to die.
Tell me... What's it like...
to finally meet the man that killed your mother... and father?
translation.it: ad avere finalmente davanti l'assassino dei tuoi genitori?

translation.en: But, of course...
we've met before,
you and I.
Shit!
Why don't you let my brother and Celia go?
translation.it: Perché non lasci andare mio fratello e Celia?

translation.en: Funny you should mention Agent Celia.
translation.it: Buffo che tu abbia nominato l'agente Celia.

translation.en: [Matias] Celia...
I tried to warn Dias, but he couldn't leave it alone.
translation.it: Ho cercato di avvertire Dias, ma lui non ha voluto mollare.

translation.en: You bitch!
Why did you do this, money?
Money?
Ferreira is my uncle...
and I've worked for him since day one,
translation.it: Lavoro per lui sin dal primo giorno.

translation.en: and when you and your brother disappear,
translation.it: E continuerò a farlo anche dopo che voi due sarete spariti.

translation.en: I'll go back and I'll keep working for him and maybe one day head up DNIC.
translation.it: E continuerò a farlo anche dopo che voi due sarete spariti. Magari diventerò comandante del DNIC.

translation.en: They will discover and then nail your ass.
-[Celia] I hope you enjoy this, uncle. -The demon spirits have got him.
translation.it: Goditi il momento, zio. Ormai è in mano agli spiriti demoniaci.

translation.en: Very powerful.
You're lucky I didn't put a bullet in your head all those years ago.
translation.it: Sei fortunato che non ti abbia piantato una pallottola in testa, all'epoca.

translation.en: Now you can pay for my scar.
translation.it: Ora pagherai per avermi sfregiato il viso.

translation.en: Cut both their heads off and send them to DNIC.
translation.it: Decapitali entrambi. Manda le teste al DNIC.

translation.en: Bring his heart to me.
No one fucks with me. No one!
I waited 35 years for this.
To be honest, I'm not satisfied.
Time to leave.
I'm tired. I'm bored.
[Matias] Cut me loose and I won't let him kill you.
translation.it: Liberami e gli impedirò di ucciderti.

translation.en: -You're a real funny bloke. -[Matias] Dias.
Let's see how funny it is when I skin your brother alive.
translation.it: Ora lo scuoio vivo e vediamo se ridi.

translation.en: Dias, wake up, brother.
Motherfucker!
Get my car.
Get us out of here.
Drive! Drive!
Take care of my brother. Get him to the hospital.
translation.it: Pensa tu a lui. Portalo in ospedale.

translation.en: I'll get Ferreira and Celia. She's the mole. Give me the car keys.
translation.it: Io prendo Ferreira e Celia. Era lei la talpa.

translation.en: Celia?
Damn, she was so hot.
[Matias] No hospital. Don't lose sight of Dias.
translation.it: Niente ospedale. Stai incollato a Dias.

translation.en: Orlando, stop here.
Get Dias.
I should shoot you dead, here and now...
translation.it: Dovrei ammazzarti qui e ora, ma io non sono come te.

translation.en: but I'm not you. You're just going to have to rot in prison.
translation.it: Dovrei ammazzarti qui e ora, ma io non sono come te. Marcirai in prigione.

translation.en: You should have killed me when you had the chance.
Dias.
Mr. Mackie, sir. The visitors are here, from Ghana.
translation.it: Signor Mackie, sono arrivati i suoi ospiti dal Ghana.

translation.en: Thanks, Robert.
-What's Ghana, Daddy? -The land of milk and honey, sweetheart.
translation.it: Cos'è il Ghana, papà? La terra promessa, tesoro.

translation.en: Land of milk and honey.
You okay?
-Santana. -[man] Did you kill him?
You're going to die, Dias Santana.
Who is this?
You killed my brother, Ferreira... and now I'm going to kill you.
translation.it: Tu hai ucciso mio fratello Ferreira e io ucciderò te.
